description: Single storey side and rear extension
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s):

Existing ground floor plan (Drawing number: FER1001) (Revision: D1); Existing first floor plan (Drawing number: FER1001) (Revision: D1); Proposed ground floor plan (Drawing number: FER1003) (Revision: D1); Proposed first floor plan (Drawing number: FER1004) (Revision: D1); Existing and proposed front elevation (Drawing number: FER1005) (Revision: D1); Existing and proposed rear elevation (Drawing number: FER1006) (Revision: D1); Existing and proposed side elevation (Drawing number: FER1007) (Revision: D1); Existing and proposed side elevation (Drawing number: FER1008) (Revision: D1); Existing Roof plan (Drawing number: FER1009) (Revision: D1); Existing site plan (Drawing number: FER1010) (Revision: D1); Existing site plan (Drawing number: FER1011) (Revision: D1); Proposed site plan (Drawing number: FER1012) (Revision: D1); Proposed block plan (Drawing number: FER1013) (Revision: D1).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2015), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2015) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | No part of the roof of the ground floor rear extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
